title: True lovers extremity; or, The maidens miserable moan. This charming fair, through deep dispair, did end her days in grief: to death alone, she made her moan, who yielded her relief.To the tune of, Charon make hast, &c. This may be printed, R.P.
publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in Pye-corner.,
